text: Olivier Chansou (born 1965) is a French aerospace engineer. Since the 27th of November 2017, he is the head of the French Civil Aviation University.Décret du 27 novembre 2017 portant nomination du directeur de l'Ecole nationale de l'aviation civile (ENAC) - M. CHANSOU (Olivier) Graduate from the ENAC (IÉNAC L85) and having a Master of Science in IT, he has done different jobs in air navigation such as director of four departments of the air traffic center of Bordeaux.Nomination d'Olivier Chansou au poste de directeur de l'Ecole Nationale de l'Aviation Civile ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the École nationale de l'aviation civile Category:French aviators Category:Heads of the French Civil Aviation University
title: Olivier Chansou
